resources.string: Are you sure you want to set the usage count of this entry to 0?
Customize the behavior when interacting with the entry list.
Adjust the theme, language and other settings that affect the appearance of the app.
Configure encryption, biometric unlock, auto lock and other security settings.
Import backups of Aegis or other authenticator apps. Create manual exports of your Aegis vault.
Find a list of all reported important events that happened within the app.
Set up automatic backups to a location of your choosing or enable participation in Android\'s cloud backup system.
Apply an overlay based on the colors of your Android theme
Display icons next to each entry
Select number of digits to group codes by
Only show account name when necessary
Only show account names whenever they share the same issuer. Other account names will be hidden.
This setting is overridden by the tiles view mode. Account name will always be shown below the issuer.
Allow Android\'s cloud backup system to include Aegis\' vault in its backups. This is only supported for encrypted vaults.

string.name: pref_android_backups_hint
string.i: Device-to-device (D2D) backups are always allowed, regardless of the setting above

resources.string: Automatically create backups of the vault on external storage when changes are made. This is only supported for encrypted vaults.
Show a reminder to backup your vault in case you haven\'t backed up your latest changes.

Disabling this reminder means Aegis won\'t tell you whether or not you have changes that are not backed up yet. This puts you at risk of losing access to your tokens. Are you sure you want to disable the reminder?
Keep an infinite number of versions of the backup
Import tokens from an app (requires root access)
Generates export QR codes compatible with Google Authenticator
Show a %s reminder to enter the password, so that you don\'t forget it.
Block screenshots and other attempts to capture the screen within the app
Tokens will be hidden by default. Tap on the tokens to reveal code.
If enabled, the password that is used to unlock the app can\'t be used to decrypt backups and exports anymore.
Set a new password that\'ll be used to encrypt the vault during backup and export.
Encrypt the vault and unlock it with a password or biometrics
Allow biometric authentication to unlock the vault
Set a new password which you will need to unlock your vault
No important events have been reported within the app
The vault has been successfully unlocked
A backup of the vault has been successfully created
A backup of the vault has been successfully created by Android
A copy of the vault has been exported
An attempt to unlock the vault with a password failed
An attempt to unlock the vault with biometrics failed
This action will export the vault out of Aegis\' internal storage. Select the format you\'d like your export to be in:
You are about to export an unencrypted copy of your Aegis vault. This is not recommended.
Exports are encrypted using a separate password configured in Security settings.

string.name: export_html_title
string.comment: The title of an HTML export document

resources.string: Aegis is a security-focused 2FA app. Tokens are stored in a vault, that can optionally be encrypted with a password of your choosing. If an attacker obtains your encrypted vault file, they will not be able to access the contents without knowing the password.\n\nWe\'ve preselected the option that we think would fit best for your device.
No password is needed to unlock the vault and it will not be encrypted. This option is not recommended.
A password is needed to unlock the vault.
Warning: If you forget your password, you will permanently lose access to your tokens. There is no way to recover them without the password.
In addition to a password, biometrics registered on this device, like a fingerprint or your face, can be used to unlock the vault.

string.name: authentication_multiline
string.comment: The newline in the middle is used for aesthetic purposes

resources.string: Or tap here to use biometrics
A change in your device\'s security settings has been detected. Please go to \"Aegis -> Settings -> Security -> Biometric unlock\" to disable and re-enable biometric unlock.
Please enter your password. We occasionally ask you to do this so that you don\'t forget it.

We occasionally prompt you to enter your password instead to ensure you haven\'t forgotten it and won\'t get locked out of your vault. After entering your password once, Aegis will default back to biometric unlock until it\'s time for another password reminder.
It looks like this 2FAS backup is encrypted. Please enter the password below.

It looks like your Authy tokens are encrypted. Please close Aegis, open Authy and unlock the tokens with your password. Instead, Aegis can also attempt to decrypt your Authy tokens for you, if you enter your password below.
Incorrect password. Make sure you didn\'t mistype your password.
Passwords should be identical and non-empty

plurals.name: added_new_entries
plurals.item: Added %d new entry to the vault
Added %d new entries to the vault

resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?

This action does not disable 2FA for:
%s

To prevent losing access, make sure that you have disabled 2FA or that you have an alternative way to generate codes for this service.

plurals.name: delete_entries_description
plurals.item: Are you sure you want to delete %d entry?
Are you sure you want to delete %d entries?

plurals.name: archive_entry_description
plurals.item: Are you sure you want to archive this entry?
Are you sure you want to archive these entries?

resources.string: Your changes have not been saved
Aegis is a free, secure and open source 2FA app
Aegis has been set up and is ready to go.
An error occurred while trying to unlock the vault
An error occurred while trying to unlock the vault. Your vault file might be corrupt.
An error occurred while trying to save the vault
An error occurred while trying to initialize the vault
An error occurred while trying to load the vault from storage

An error occurred while trying to decrypt the vault with biometric authentication. This usually only happens if the security settings of your device were changed. Please unlock the vault with your password and reconfigure biometric authentication in the settings of Aegis.

An error occurred while trying to prepare biometric authentication. This usually only happens if the security settings of your device were changed. Please unlock the vault with your password and reconfigure biometric authentication in the settings of Aegis.
Are you sure you want to disable encryption? This will cause the vault to be stored in plain text. Automatic backups will also be disabled.
An error occurred while enabling encryption
An error occurred while disabling encryption
An error occurred while trying to create a backup
No backups have been made yet
Backups are encrypted using a separate password configured in Security settings

DocumentsUI appears to be missing from your device. This is an important system component necessary for the selection and creation of documents. If you used a tool to "debloat" your device, you may have accidentally deleted it and will have to reinstall it.
An error occurred while trying to import an icon pack
The icon pack you\'re trying to import already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
An error occurred while trying to delete an icon pack
Which format does the andOTP backup file have?
Is this TOTP Authenticator backup encrypted with a password?
Select the application you\'d like to import from
Select your desired account name position
An error occurred while trying to parse the file
An error occurred while trying to read the file

The version of %s that\'s installed is not supported. Recent versions have started encrypting some of the files in the internal storage directory, making Aegis unable to access the information it needs for the import. Attempting to import is likely to result in an error. Would you like to continue anyway?
Error: Unable to obtain root access
An error occurred while importing the vault
One or more errors occurred during the import
An error occurred while trying to export the vault
An error occurred while trying to set the password.

An error occurred while trying to enable biometric unlock. Some devices have poor implementations of biometric authentication and it is likely that yours is one of them. Consider switching to a password-only configuration instead.
An error occurred while trying to read the QR code
Aegis is not compatible with Microsoft\'s proprietary 2FA algorithm. Please make sure to select \"Setup application without notifications\" when configuring 2FA in Office 365.

Some QR codes are missing from your import. The following codes were not found:

%s

You may continue importing this partial export but we recommend retrying with all of the QR codes so you don't risk losing access to any tokens.
Export contains information for an unrelated batch. Try importing 1 batch at a time.
No tokens can be imported as a result
If an entry is not part of any group, it can be found under \"No group\".
Are you sure you want to remove this group? Entries in this group will automatically switch to \'No group\'.
Are you sure you want to delete all groups that are not assigned to an entry?
Are you sure you want to remove this icon pack? Entries that use icons from this pack will not be affected.

string.name: sort
string.comment: Title of the Sort button in the top action bar of the main view

resources.string: Manage and delete your groups here
Reset the usage count of every entry in your vault
Are you sure you want to set the usage count of every entry in your vault to 0?

string.name: note
string.comment: Users can add a note to an entry

resources.string: Make tokens easier to distinguish from each other by temporarily highlighting them when tapped
Minimize the app after copying a token
Pause automatic refresh of tokens by tapping them. Tokens will not update as long as they are focused. Requires \"Highlight tokens when tapped\" or \"Tap to reveal\".
Enter your password to enable the PIN keyboard. Note that this only works if your password only consists of numbers
It\'s not possible to set PIN keyboard. Your password must only consists of numbers.
Password changed. The PIN keyboard will no longer be shown.

plurals.name: import_error_dialog
plurals.item: Aegis could not import %d token. This token will be skipped. Press \'details\' to see more information about the error.
Aegis could not import %d tokens. These tokens will be skipped. Press \'details\' to see more information about the errors.

resources.string: Unable to read and process QR code from file: %s.
Unable to process shared text as OTP
Unable to read and process some of the QR codes. Only %d/%d entries will be imported.

string.name: tile_open_vault
string.comment: label for a quick settings tile that opens the app when tapped

string.name: tile_open_scanner
string.comment: label for a quick settings tile that opens the QR code scanner when tapped

resources.string: Aegis can create a persistent notification to notify you when the vault is locked
Vault is unlocked. Tap here to lock.
Aegis Authenticator is licensed under GPLv3
Licenses of the third-party libraries Aegis uses
Support us by leaving a review in the Google Play Store
This device doesn\'t support web view, which is necessary to view the changelog and the license. It is missing a system component.

Aegis relies on the system time to be in sync to generate correct codes. A deviation of only a few seconds could result in incorrect codes. It looks like your device is not configured to automatically synchronize the time. Would you like to do so now?
Stop warning me. I know what I\'m doing.
Unrelated QR code found. Try restarting the scanner.
Expected QR code #%d, but scanned #%d instead

string.name: backup_error_dialog_details
string.comment: The first parameter is the type of backup (e.g. built-in or Android backup). The second parameter is an elapsed time in the style of 'x seconds/minutes/days ago'.

resources.string: A recent vault backup attempt using %s failed because an error occurred. The backup was attempted %s. Please check your backup settings to make sure backups can complete successfully.

string.name: backup_permission_error_dialog_details
string.comment: The first parameter is the type of backup (e.g. built-in or Android backup). The second parameter is an elapsed time in the style of 'x seconds/minutes/days ago'.

resources.string: A recent vault backup attempt using %s failed because Aegis did not have permission to write to the backup destination. The backup was attempted %s. This error can occur if you moved/renamed the backup destination or if you recently restored Aegis from a backup. Please reconfigure the backup destination.

string.name: backup_reminder_bar_message_with_latest
string.comment: The parameter is an elapsed time in the style of 'x seconds/minutes/days ago'

resources.string: Recent changes to the vault have not been backed up yet. It\'s important to take regular backups to prevent losing access to your accounts. Please consider setting up automatic backups in the settings menu.

string.name: backup_plaintext_export_warning
string.b: The vault was recently exported in plain text

resources.string: This warning is shown because you recently exported an unencrypted copy of the vault. To maintain security of your tokens, we recommend deleting this file once it\'s no longer needed.
There are no codes to be shown. Start adding entries by tapping the plus sign in the bottom right corner
There are no groups to be shown. Add groups in the edit screen of an entry
No icon packs have been imported yet. Tap the plus sign to import one. Tip: try aegis-icons.
Unable to copy URI to clipboard
Scan this QR code with the authenticator app you would like to transfer this entry to
Scan these QR codes with Aegis or Google Authenticator.\n\nDue to limitations of the Google Authenticator app, only TOTP & HOTP tokens that use SHA1 and produce 6-digit codes are included
Password too long for strength analysis
Enable this if you want to enable the PIN keyboard on the lockscreen. This only works for numeric passwords
Your vault already contains entries. Do you want to remove these entries before importing this file?\n\nIn doing so, you will permanently lose access to the existing entries in the vault.
Aegis received panic trigger but setting is disabled, ignoring
Delete vault when a panic trigger is received from Ripple
Want to import from a different 2FA app? Complete the setup first and then head over to the settings menu.

plurals.name: import_duplicate_toast
plurals.item: Unchecked %d potential duplicate. Please review the list of entries.
Unchecked %d potential duplicates. Please review the list of entries.

resources.string: Supply an Authenticator Plus export file obtained through Settings -> Backup & Restore -> Export as Text and HTML.
Supply an Authenticator Pro export file obtained through Settings -> Back up -> Back up to encrypted file (recommended).
Supply a copy of /data/data/com.authy.authy/shared_prefs/com.authy.storage.tokens.authenticator.xml, located in the internal storage directory of Authy.
Supply a Bitwarden export/backup file. Encrypted files are not supported.
Supply a copy of /data/data/com.blizzard.messenger/shared_prefs/com.blizzard.messenger.authenticator_preferences.xml, located in the internal storage directory of Battle.net Authenticator.
Supply a copy of /data/data/com.duosecurity.duomobile/files/duokit/accounts.json, located in the internal storage directory of DUO.
Supply a copy of /data/data/org.fedorahosted.freeotp/shared_prefs/tokens.xml, located in the internal storage directory of FreeOTP (1.x).

Only database files from Google Authenticator v5.10 and prior are supported.\n\nSupply a copy of /data/data/com.google.android.apps.authenticator2/databases/databases, located in the internal storage directory of Google Authenticator.
Supply a copy of /data/data/com.azure.authenticator/databases/PhoneFactor, located in the internal storage directory of Microsoft Authenticator.
Supply a plain text file with a Google Authenticator URI on each line.
Steam v3.0 and newer are not supported. Supply a copy of /data/data/com.valvesoftware.android.steam.community/files/Steamguard-*.json, located in the internal storage directory of Steam.
Supply a TOTP Authenticator export file.
Do you want to assign icons to the imported entries?
Import entries directly from %s. This requires the app to be installed on this device and for root access to be granted to Aegis.
Focus the search immediately after opening the app.
